trans-unit.source: Represents a selection control with a drop-down list that can be shown or hidden by clicking the arrow on the control.
trans-unit.target: Representerer en utvalget kontroll med en rullegardinliste som kan vises eller skjules ved å klikke pil kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The ComboBox allows the user to select an item from a drop-down list or optionally to enter new text in the text box of the control.
trans-unit.target: I kombinasjonsboksen tillater brukeren å velge et element fra en rullegardinliste, eller eventuelt angi ny tekst i tekstboksen for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: ComboBox is an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>, which means it can contain a collection of objects of any type (such as string, image, or panel).
trans-unit.target: ComboBox er en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>, som betyr at den kan inneholde en samling objekter av en annen type (for eksempel streng, image eller panelet).</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl> class.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, kan du se <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>klasse.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.IsEditable%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.IsReadOnly%2A> properties specify how the ComboBox behaves when the user does one of the following: - Enters a string to select an item in the ComboBox.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.IsEditable%2A>og <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.IsReadOnly%2A>Egenskaper angi hvordan ComboBox virker når brukeren gjør ett av følgende:-går inn i en streng for å velge et element i ComboBox.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.IsReadOnly%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.IsEditable%2A>

trans-unit.source: - Enters a string that does not correspond to an item in the ComboBox.
trans-unit.target: -Går inn i en streng som ikke svarer til et element i ComboBox.

trans-unit.source: - Selects part of the string that is in the text box.
trans-unit.target: -Velg en del av strengen som er i tekstboksen.

trans-unit.source: - Copies or pastes a value into the text box.
trans-unit.target: -Overfører eller limer inn en verdi i tekstboksen.

trans-unit.source: The following table describes the actions the user can and cannot take, depending on the values of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.IsEditable%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.IsReadOnly%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor beskriver handlingene brukeren kan og ikke ta, avhengig av verdien for <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.IsEditable%2A>og <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.IsReadOnly%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.IsReadOnly%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.IsEditable%2A>

|| <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.IsReadOnly%2A> is `true`|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.IsReadOnly%2A> is `false`| |-|--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| | <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.IsEditable%2A>er `true`|-kan ikke velge et element i ComboBox ved å angi en streng.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.IsEditable%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.IsReadOnly%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.IsReadOnly%2A>

trans-unit.source: - Cannot enter a string that does not correspond to an item in the ComboBox.
trans-unit.target: -Kan ikke angi en streng som ikke svarer til et element i ComboBox.

trans-unit.source: - Can select part of the string in the ComboBox text box.
trans-unit.target: – Kan velge en del av en streng i tekstboksen ComboBox.

trans-unit.source: - Can copy the string in the ComboBox text box, but cannot paste a string into the ComboBox text box.|- Can select an item in the ComboBox by entering a string.
trans-unit.target: – Kan kopiere strengen i tekstboksen ComboBox, men kan ikke lime inn en streng i tekstboksen ComboBox. | – Kan velge et element i ComboBox ved å angi en streng.

trans-unit.source: - Can enter a string that does not correspond to an item in the ComboBox.
trans-unit.target: – Kan angi en streng som ikke svarer til et element i ComboBox.

trans-unit.source: - Can select part of the string in the ComboBox text box.
trans-unit.target: – Kan velge en del av en streng i tekstboksen ComboBox.

trans-unit.source: - Can copy or paste the string in the ComboBox text box.| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.IsEditable%2A> is `false`|- Can select an item in the ComboBox by entering a string.
trans-unit.target: – Kan kopiere eller lime inn strengen i tekstboksen ComboBox. | | <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.IsEditable%2A>er `false`|-kan velge et element i ComboBox ved å angi en streng.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.IsEditable%2A>

trans-unit.source: - Cannot enter a string that does not correspond to an item in the ComboBox.
trans-unit.target: -Kan ikke angi en streng som ikke svarer til et element i ComboBox.

trans-unit.source: - Cannot select part of the string in the ComboBox.
trans-unit.target: -Kan ikke velge en del av en streng i kombinasjonsboksen.

trans-unit.source: - Cannot copy or paste the string in the ComboBox.|- Can select an item in the ComboBox by entering a string.
trans-unit.target: -Kan ikke kopiere eller lime inn en streng i ComboBox. | – Kan velge et element i ComboBox ved å angi en streng.

trans-unit.source: - Cannot enter a string that does not correspond to an item in the ComboBox.
trans-unit.target: -Kan ikke angi en streng som ikke svarer til et element i ComboBox.

trans-unit.source: - Cannot select part of the string in the ComboBox.
trans-unit.target: -Kan ikke velge en del av en streng i kombinasjonsboksen.

trans-unit.source: - Cannot copy or paste the string in the ComboBox.| The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.IsReadOnly%2A> property has an effect only if <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.IsEditable%2A> is `true`.
trans-unit.target: -Kan ikke kopiere eller lime inn strengen i i kombinasjonsboksen. | Den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.IsReadOnly%2A>egenskapen har en effekt hvis <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.IsEditable%2A>er `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.IsEditable%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.IsReadOnly%2A>

trans-unit.source: The ComboBox is an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>, so it can display content other than simple strings.
trans-unit.target: I kombinasjonsboksen er en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>, så den kan vise innholdet enn enkle strenger.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>

trans-unit.source: For example, you can create a ComboBox that contains a list of images.
trans-unit.target: Du kan for eksempel opprette en kombinasjonsboks som inneholder en liste over bilder.

trans-unit.source: When you have content other than strings in the ComboBox, a nonsensical string might appear in the ComboBox when the drop-down list is hidden.
trans-unit.target: Når du har innhold enn strenger i i kombinasjonsboksen, vises kanskje en meningsløst streng i ComboBox når fra rullegardinlisten er skjult.

trans-unit.source: To display a string in the ComboBox when it contains non-string items, use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextSearch.Text%2A?displayProperty=fullName> or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextSearch.TextPath%2A?displayProperty=fullName>attached property.
trans-unit.target: For å vise en streng i ComboBox når den inneholder elementer som ikke er streng, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextSearch.Text%2A?displayProperty=fullName>eller <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextSearch.TextPath%2A?displayProperty=fullName>kobles til egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextSearch.TextPath%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextSearch.Text%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Customizing the ComboBox Control To apply the same property settings to multiple ComboBox controls, use the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Tilpasse ComboBox kontrollen til i gjelder samme egenskapsinnstillingene flere ComboBox kontroller, bruk av <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can modify the default <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> to give the control a unique appearance.
trans-unit.target: Du kan endre standard <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>Gi kontrollen unikt utseende.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>

trans-unit.source: For more information about creating a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>, see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: For mer informasjon om hvordan du oppretter en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>, se [tilpasse utseendet til en eksisterende kontroll ved å opprette en ControlTemplate](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>

trans-unit.source: To see the parts and states that are specific to the ComboBox, see [ComboBox Styles and Templates](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil se delene og statusene som er spesifikke for ComboBox, kan du se [ComboBox stiler og maler](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control’s default style.
trans-unit.target: Avhengighet egenskapene for denne kontrollen, kan angis ved kontrollens standardstilen.

trans-unit.source: If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application.
trans-unit.target: Hvis en egenskap er satt av en standardstilen, kan endre egenskapen standardverdi når kontrollen vises i applikasjonen.

trans-unit.source: The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running.
trans-unit.target: Standardstilen er avhengig av hvilken stasjonær tema brukes når programmet kjører.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [standard WPF oppsett](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252).

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Setting a visual property will only have an effect if that property is both present in ComboBox control's default template and is set by using a .
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Angi en visual egenskap trenger bare en effekt hvis egenskapen er begge finnes i ComboBox kontrollens standardmalen og angis ved hjelp av en.

trans-unit.source: You can find a list of visual properties in the "Changing the Visual Structure of a Control" section in [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](../Topic/Customizing%20the%20Appearance%20of%20an%20Existing%20Control%20by%20Creating%20a%20ControlTemplate.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner en liste over visual egenskaper i delen "Endring i Visual strukturen av et kontroll" [tilpasse utseendet til en eksisterende kontroll ved å opprette en ControlTemplate](../Topic/Customizing%20the%20Appearance%20of%20an%20Existing%20Control%20by%20Creating%20a%20ControlTemplate.md).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the drop-down list of the combo box closes.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når fra rullegardinlisten på kombinasjonsboksen lukkes.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the drop-down list of the combo box opens.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når fra rullegardinlisten på kombinasjonsboksen åpnes.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Creates or identifies the element used to display the specified item.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter eller identifiserer elementet brukes til å vise det angitte elementet.

trans-unit.source: The element used to display the specified item.
trans-unit.target: Elementet brukes til å vise det angitte elementet.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether a combo box supports scrolling.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om en kombinasjonsboks støtter rulling.

trans-unit.source: If the control has a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> in its style and has a custom keyboard scrolling behavior, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox.HandlesScrolling%2A> should return `true`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis kontrollen har en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>i malen og har et egendefinert tastatur rulling virkemåte for <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox.HandlesScrolling%2A>skal returnere `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox.HandlesScrolling%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox"></xref> supports scrolling; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox"> </xref> støtter rulling; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox"></xref> has focus.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox"> </xref> er i fokus.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox"></xref> has focus; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox"> </xref> har fokus; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the drop-down for a combo box is currently open.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om rullegardinlisten for en kombinasjonsboks er åpen.

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`||
trans-unit.target: ## Egenskapen avhengighetsinformasjon ||| |-|-| | ID-feltet | | | Metadata egenskapene til `true`||

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the drop-down is open; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis rullegardinlisten er åpen. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.IsDropDownOpen*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifiserer den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.IsDropDownOpen*>avhengighetsegenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.IsDropDownOpen*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that enables or disables editing of the text in text box of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som aktiverer eller deaktiverer redigering av teksten i tekstboksen til den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The IsEditable and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.IsReadOnly%2A> properties specify how the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox> behaves when the user does one of the following: - Enters a string to select an item in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>.
trans-unit.target: IsEditable og <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.IsReadOnly%2A>egenskapene angi hvordan <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>fungerer når brukeren gjør ett av følgende:-går inn i en streng for å velge et element i <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.IsReadOnly%2A>

trans-unit.source: - Enters a string that does not correspond to an item in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>.
trans-unit.target: -Går inn i en streng som ikke svarer til et element i <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>

trans-unit.source: - Selects part of the string that is in the text box.
trans-unit.target: -Velg en del av strengen som er i tekstboksen.

trans-unit.source: - Copies or pastes a value into the text box.
trans-unit.target: -Overfører eller limer inn en verdi i tekstboksen.

trans-unit.source: The following table describes the actions the user can and cannot take, depending on the values of IsEditable and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.IsReadOnly%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor beskriver handlingene brukeren kan og ikke ta, avhengig av verdien for IsEditable og <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.IsReadOnly%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.IsReadOnly%2A>

|| <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.IsReadOnly%2A> is `true`|<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.IsReadOnly%2A> is `false`| |-|--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| | IsEditable er `true`|-kan ikke velge et element i den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>ved å angi en streng.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.IsReadOnly%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.IsReadOnly%2A>

trans-unit.source: - Cannot enter a string that does not correspond to an item in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>.
trans-unit.target: -Kan ikke angi en streng som ikke svarer til et element i <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>

trans-unit.source: - Can select part of the string in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox> text box.
trans-unit.target: -Velge en del av strengen i den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>tekstboks.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>

trans-unit.source: - Can copy the string in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox> text box, but cannot paste a string into the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox> text box.|- Can select an item in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox> by entering a string.
trans-unit.target: – Kan kopiere strengen i tekstboksen <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>, men kan ikke lime inn en streng i tekstboksen <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>. | – Kan velge et element i den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>ved å angi en streng.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>

trans-unit.source: - Can enter a string that does not correspond to an item in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>.
trans-unit.target: – Kan angi en streng som ikke svarer til et element i <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>

trans-unit.source: - Can select part of the string in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox> text box.
trans-unit.target: -Velge en del av strengen i den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>tekstboks.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>

trans-unit.source: - Can copy or paste the string in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox> text box.| |IsEditable is `false`|- Can select an item in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox> by entering a string.
trans-unit.target: – Kan kopiere eller lime inn strengen i tekstboksen <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>. | | IsEditable er `false`|-kan velge et element i den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>ved å angi en streng.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>

trans-unit.source: - Cannot enter a string that does not correspond to an item in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>.
trans-unit.target: -Kan ikke angi en streng som ikke svarer til et element i <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>

trans-unit.source: - Cannot select part of the string in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>.
trans-unit.target: -Kan ikke velge en del av en streng i <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>

trans-unit.source: - Cannot copy or paste the string in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>.|- Can select an item in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox> by entering a string.
trans-unit.target: -Kan ikke kopiere eller lime inn strengen i <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>. | – Kan velge et element i den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>ved å angi en streng.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>

trans-unit.source: - Cannot enter a string that does not correspond to an item in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>.
trans-unit.target: -Kan ikke angi en streng som ikke svarer til et element i <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>

trans-unit.source: - Cannot select part of the string in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>.
trans-unit.target: -Kan ikke velge en del av en streng i <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>

trans-unit.source: - Cannot copy or paste the string in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>.| When IsEditable is equal to `false`, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox> uses a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter> to display the currently selected item; when IsEditable is equal to `true`, a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> is used for this purpose instead.
trans-unit.target: -Kan ikke kopiere eller lime inn en streng i <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>. | Når IsEditable er lik `false`, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>bruker en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter>elementet skal vises for øyeblikket er valgt; når IsEditable er lik `true`, en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>brukes i stedet for dette formålet.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>

trans-unit.source: Note that a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> only displays plain text, and that a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBoxItem> may include non-plain text content, such as images.
trans-unit.target: Legg merke til at en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>viser bare ren tekst, og at en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBoxItem>kan inkludere ikke ren tekst innhold, for eksempel bilder.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBoxItem> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox"></xref> can be edited; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox"> </xref> kan være redigerte; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.IsEditable*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifiserer den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.IsEditable*>avhengighetsegenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.IsEditable*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Determines if the specified item is (or is eligible to be) its own `ItemContainer`.
trans-unit.target: Bestemmer om det angitte elementet er (eller er autorisert til å være) sin egen `ItemContainer`.

trans-unit.source: Specified item.
trans-unit.target: Angitte elementet.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the item is its own `ItemContainer`; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis elementet er et eget `ItemContainer`; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that enables selection-only mode, in which the contents of the combo box are selectable but not editable.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som gjør det mulig for valg-only-modus, der innholdet i kombinasjonsboksen er valgbar men kan ikke redigeres.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.IsEditable%2A> and IsReadOnly properties specify how the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox> behaves when the user does one of the following: - Enters a string to select an item in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.IsEditable%2A>og IsReadOnly egenskaper som angir hvordan <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>fungerer når brukeren gjør ett av følgende:-går inn i en streng for å velge et element i <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.IsEditable%2A>

trans-unit.source: - Enters a string that does not correspond to an item in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>.
trans-unit.target: -Går inn i en streng som ikke svarer til et element i <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>

trans-unit.source: - Selects part of the string that is in the text box.
trans-unit.target: -Velg en del av strengen som er i tekstboksen.

trans-unit.source: - Copies or pastes a value into the text box.
trans-unit.target: -Overfører eller limer inn en verdi i tekstboksen.

trans-unit.source: The following table describes the actions the user can and cannot take, depending on the values of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.IsEditable%2A> and IsReadOnly.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor beskriver handlingene brukeren kan og ikke ta, avhengig av verdiene i <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.IsEditable%2A>og IsReadOnly.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.IsEditable%2A>

trans-unit.source: - Cannot enter a string that does not correspond to an item in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>.
trans-unit.target: -Kan ikke angi en streng som ikke svarer til et element i <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>

trans-unit.source: - Can select part of the string in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox> text box.
trans-unit.target: -Velge en del av strengen i den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>tekstboks.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>

trans-unit.source: - Can copy the string in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox> text box, but cannot paste a string into the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox> text box.|- Can select an item in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox> by entering a string.
trans-unit.target: – Kan kopiere strengen i tekstboksen <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>, men kan ikke lime inn en streng i tekstboksen <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>. | – Kan velge et element i den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>ved å angi en streng.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>

trans-unit.source: - Can enter a string that does not correspond to an item in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>.
trans-unit.target: – Kan angi en streng som ikke svarer til et element i <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>

trans-unit.source: - Can select part of the string in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox> text box.
trans-unit.target: -Velge en del av strengen i den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>tekstboks.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>

trans-unit.source: - Can copy or paste the string in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox> text box.| |<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.IsEditable%2A> is `false`|- Can select an item in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox> by entering a string.
trans-unit.target: – Kan kopiere eller lime inn strengen i tekstboksen <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>. | | <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.IsEditable%2A>er `false`|-kan velge et element i den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>ved å angi en streng.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.IsEditable%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>

trans-unit.source: - Cannot enter a string that does not correspond to an item in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>.
trans-unit.target: -Kan ikke angi en streng som ikke svarer til et element i <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>

trans-unit.source: - Cannot select part of the string in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>.
trans-unit.target: -Kan ikke velge en del av en streng i <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>

trans-unit.source: - Cannot copy or paste the string in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>.|- Can select an item in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox> by entering a string.
trans-unit.target: -Kan ikke kopiere eller lime inn strengen i <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>. | – Kan velge et element i den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>ved å angi en streng.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>

trans-unit.source: - Cannot enter a string that does not correspond to an item in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>.
trans-unit.target: -Kan ikke angi en streng som ikke svarer til et element i <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>

trans-unit.source: - Cannot select part of the string in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>.
trans-unit.target: -Kan ikke velge en del av en streng i <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>

trans-unit.source: - Cannot copy or paste the string in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>.| When <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.IsEditable%2A> is equal to `false`, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox> uses a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter> to display the currently selected item; when <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.IsEditable%2A> is equal to `true`, a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> is used for this purpose instead.
trans-unit.target: -Kan ikke kopiere eller lime inn en streng i <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>. | Når <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.IsEditable%2A>er lik `false`, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>bruker en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter>skal vises for øyeblikket er valgt element; når <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.IsEditable%2A>er lik `true`, en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>brukes i stedet for dette formålet.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.IsEditable%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.IsEditable%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>

trans-unit.source: Note that a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> only displays plain text, and that a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBoxItem> may include non-plain text content, such as images.
trans-unit.target: Legg merke til at en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>viser bare ren tekst, og at en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBoxItem>kan inkludere ikke ren tekst innhold, for eksempel bilder.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBoxItem> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox"></xref> is read-only; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox"> </xref> er skrivebeskyttet; ellers, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.IsReadOnly*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifiserer den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.IsReadOnly*>avhengighetsegenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.IsReadOnly*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets whether the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.SelectionBoxItem*> is highlighted.
trans-unit.target: Henter om den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.SelectionBoxItem*>merkes.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.SelectionBoxItem*>

trans-unit.source: This property is a dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen er en avhengighetsegenskapen.

trans-unit.source: However, the dependency property identifier field for IsSelectionBoxHighlighted is not public.
trans-unit.target: Avhengighet identifikator egenskapsfeltet for IsSelectionBoxHighlighted er ikke felles.

trans-unit.source: Therefore, you cannot use the backing dependency property for property system operations that require the dependency property identifier, such as calls to <xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject.GetValue%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Du kan derfor ikke bruke avhengighetsegenskapen sikkerhetskopiering til egenskapen systemoperasjoner som krever for eksempel kall til <xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject.GetValue%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject.GetValue%2A> i egenskapsidentifikator avhengighet

trans-unit.source: However, you can still use IsSelectionBoxHighlighted as a property trigger.
trans-unit.target: Du kan imidlertid fortsatt bruke IsSelectionBoxHighlighted som utløser egenskapen.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.SelectionBoxItem*> is highlighted; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.SelectionBoxItem*>er merkede; ellers, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.SelectionBoxItem*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum height for a combo box drop-down.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir den maksimale høyden for en kombinasjonsboks rullegardinlister.

trans-unit.source: Auto sizing is not the default, and will result in the drop down size potentially exceeding the available size in the parent element.
trans-unit.target: Automatisk skalering er ikke standard, og resulterer i rullegardinliste størrelse potensielt overskrider størrelsen som er tilgjengelige i det overordnede elementet.

trans-unit.source: This is not typically desirable.
trans-unit.target: Dette er vanligvis.

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None| ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` - or – - or - ``` ## XAML Values *double* String representation of a value.
trans-unit.target: ## Egenskapen avhengighetsinformasjon ||| |-|-| | ID-feltet | | | Metadata egenskapene til `true`| Ingen | ## XAML Attributtbruk ``` - or – - or - ``` ## XAML verdier *doble* streng representasjon av en verdi.

trans-unit.source: This is interpreted as a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-dipixel-md.md)] measurement.
trans-unit.target: Dette tolkes som en [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-dipixel-md.md)] mål.

trans-unit.source: Strings need not explicitly include decimal points.
trans-unit.target: Strenger må eksplisitt inkluderer ikke desimaler.

trans-unit.source: For instance a value of `1` is acceptable.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel verdien `1` godtas.

trans-unit.source: The same <xref:System.Double> range restrictions as mentioned in the Property Value section apply.
trans-unit.target: Den samme <xref:System.Double>området begrensninger som er angitt i delen egenskapsverdien gjelder.</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: *qualifiedDouble* A *double* value as described above, followed by one of the following unit declaration strings: `px`, `in`, `cm`, `pt`.
trans-unit.target: *qualifiedDouble* en *doble* verdien som beskrevet ovenfor, etterfulgt av ett av følgende enhetsstrenger for deklarasjon: `px`, `in`, `cm`, `pt`.

trans-unit.source: `px` (default) is [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] `in` is inches; 1in==96px `cm` is centimeters; 1cm==(96/2.54) px `pt` is points; 1pt==(96/72) px `Auto` Enables autosizing behavior.
trans-unit.target: `px`(standard) er [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] `in` er cm; 1 i == 96px `cm` er centimeter; 1cm==(96/2.54) piksler `pt` er punkt; 1pt==(96/72) piksler `Auto` aktiverer autosizing virkemåte.

trans-unit.source: See Remarks.
trans-unit.target: Se kommentarer.

trans-unit.source: A double that represents the height that is retrieved or the height to set.
trans-unit.target: En dobbeltverdi som angir som hentes eller høyden til å angi.

trans-unit.source: The default value as defined to the property system is a calculated value based on taking a one-third fraction of the system max screen height parameters, but this default is potentially overridden by various control templates.
trans-unit.target: Verdien som er definert i egenskapen systemet er en beregnet verdi basert på tar en&1;-3 brøkdel av systemet maksimal skjermen høyde parametere, men denne standard overstyres potensielt av ulike kontrollmaler.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.MaxDropDownHeight*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifiserer den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.MaxDropDownHeight*>avhengighetsegenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.MaxDropDownHeight*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.target: Kalles når <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ApplyTemplate*>kalles.</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ApplyTemplate*>

trans-unit.source: Provides an appropriate <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ComboBoxAutomationPeer"></xref> implementation for this control, as part of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure.

trans-unit.target: Typespesifikke <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"> </xref> implementering.

trans-unit.target: Hendelsesdata.

trans-unit.source: Responds to a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox"></xref> selection change by raising a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector.SelectionChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Svarer på en <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox"> </xref> endret for valg av å opphøye en <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector.SelectionChanged"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: Provides data for <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.SelectionChangedEventArgs"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Gir dataene for <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.SelectionChangedEventArgs"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Prepares the specified element to display the specified item.
trans-unit.target: Forbereder det angitte elementet til å vise det angitte elementet.

trans-unit.source: Preparing the element may involve applying styles, setting bindings, and so on.
trans-unit.target: Forbereder elementet kan omfatte bruker stiler innstillingen bindinger, og så videre.

trans-unit.source: Element used to display the specified item.
trans-unit.target: Elementet som brukes til å vise det angitte elementet.

trans-unit.source: Specified item.
trans-unit.target: Angitte elementet.

trans-unit.source: Gets the item that is displayed in the selection box.
trans-unit.target: Henter elementet som vises i boksen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox> uses this property to show the selected item in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>over <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>bruker denne egenskapen for å vise det valgte elementet i <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>

trans-unit.source: To get the selected item of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox> outside of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>, use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector.SelectedItem%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property instead of this property.
trans-unit.target: Ikke hente det valgte elementet i den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>utenfor den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>, bruker den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector.SelectedItem%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen i stedet for denne egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector.SelectedItem%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: ## XAML Attributtbruk ``` ``` ## egenskapen avhengighetsinformasjon ||| |-|-| | ID-feltet | | | Metadata egenskapene til `true`| Ingen |

trans-unit.source: The selected item.
trans-unit.target: Det valgte elementet.

trans-unit.target: Identifiserer den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.SelectionBoxItem*>avhengighetsegenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.SelectionBoxItem*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets a composite string that specifies how to format the selected item in the selection box if it is displayed as a string.
trans-unit.target: Henter en sammensatt streng som angir hvordan du formaterer det valgte elementet i boksen for valg av Hvis det vises som en streng.

trans-unit.source: A composite string that specifies how to format the selected item in the selection box if it is displayed as a string.
trans-unit.target: En sammensatt tekststreng som angir hvordan du formaterer det valgte elementet i boksen hvis det vises som en streng.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.SelectionBoxItemStringFormat*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifiserer den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.SelectionBoxItemStringFormat*>avhengighetsegenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.SelectionBoxItemStringFormat*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets the item template of the selection box content.
trans-unit.target: Henter malen elementet valg for innholdet.

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: ## XAML Attributtbruk ``` ``` ## egenskapen avhengighetsinformasjon ||| |-|-| | ID-feltet | | | Metadata egenskapene til `true`| Ingen |

trans-unit.source: An item template.
trans-unit.target: En mal for elementet.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.SelectionBoxItemTemplate*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifiserer den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.SelectionBoxItemTemplate*>avhengighetsegenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.SelectionBoxItemTemplate*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox"></xref> keeps the user's input or replaces the input with a matching item.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox"> </xref> beholdes brukeren er inndata eller erstatter inndataene til en samsvarende elementet.

trans-unit.source: By default, when the user types a string into the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox> that matches one of its items, the item is selected and the text that the user typed is replaced.
trans-unit.target: Som standard når brukeren skriver en streng i den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>som samsvarer med en av elementet er valgt og teksten brukeren skrev inn erstattes.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>

trans-unit.source: This can cause the text that the user entered to change case.
trans-unit.target: Dette kan føre til tekst som brukeren som er angitt for å endre store/små bokstaver.

trans-unit.source: If the ShouldPreserveUserEnteredPrefix property is set to `true`, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox> selects the matching item, but preserves the text that the user entered.
trans-unit.target: Hvis egenskapen ShouldPreserveUserEnteredPrefix er satt til `true`, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>merke det tilsvarende elementet, men beholder teksten brukeren skrev inn.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>

trans-unit.source: For example, suppose that a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox> contains the string, "Hello" (with a capital H) and the user enters "hello" (with a lowercase h).
trans-unit.target: Tenk som en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>inneholder strengen "Hello" (med en stor H) og brukeren skriver inn "hello" (med t).</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>

trans-unit.source: If ShouldPreserveUserEnteredPrefix is `false`, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox> selects the matching item, "Hello," in its collection and populates its text box with that string.
trans-unit.target: Hvis ShouldPreserveUserEnteredPrefix `false`, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>velger samsvarende elementet "Hello" i samlingen og fyller ut tekstboksen med denne strengen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>

trans-unit.source: If ShouldPreserveUserEnteredPrefix is `true`, "Hello" is selected from the collection, but the text box says "hello."
trans-unit.target: Hvis ShouldPreserveUserEnteredPrefix `true`, "Hello" velges fra samlingen, men tekstboksen teksten "hello".

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: ## Egenskapen avhengighetsinformasjon ||| |-|-| | ID-feltet | | | Metadata egenskapene til `true`| Ingen |

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox"></xref> keeps the user's input; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox"></xref> replaces the input with a matching item The registered default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox"> </xref> beholdes er brukerinndataene; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> hvis den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox"> </xref> erstatter inndataene til en samsvarende elementet registrerte standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om hva kan påvirke verdien [avhengighet egenskapen verdien prioriteten](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets whether a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox"></xref> that is open and displays a drop-down control will remain open when a user clicks the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TextBox"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir om en <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox"> </xref> som er åpen og viser en rullegardin forblir åpne når en bruker klikker du <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.TextBox"> </xref>.

trans-unit.target: ## Egenskapen avhengighetsinformasjon ||| |-|-| | ID-feltet | | | Metadata egenskapene til `true`| Ingen |

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to keep the drop-down control open when the user clicks on the text area to start editing; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis du vil beholde rullegardin åpne når brukeren klikker på området for å begynne å redigere; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text of the currently selected item.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir teksten for det valgte elementet.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.IsEditable%2A> property is `true`, setting this property places initial text entered in the text box.
trans-unit.target: Når den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.IsEditable%2A>egenskapen `true`, når egenskapen settes plasserer første teksten som er angitt i tekstboksen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.IsEditable%2A>

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.IsEditable%2A> is `false`, setting this value has no effect.
trans-unit.target: Når <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.IsEditable%2A>er `false`, setter denne verdien har ingen virkning.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.IsEditable%2A>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|, |
trans-unit.target: ## Egenskapen avhengighetsinformasjon ||| |-|-| | ID-feltet | | | Metadata egenskapene til `true`|, |

trans-unit.source: The string of the currently selected item.
trans-unit.target: Strengen for det valgte elementet.

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: Standarden er en tom streng ("").
